title: Savage Offroad
description: SAVAGE OFFROAD is a retro-inspired truck racing game set in a post apocalyptic future. It's part racing, part gladiatorial combat and ALL ACTION! Join a tribe of irradiated savages that FIGHT and RACE for the future!Features:Support for local multiplayer up to 4 playersSingle player mode VS savage AIRace four trucks or up to 16 for complete brutalitySplit screen or classic top-down viewEliminations - race to win or die tryingUpgrade your truckCollect turbos and cash on 15 awesome tracksOriginal
